mapper.select: SELECT DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID AS disposalFreezeDegreeUuid, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID AS disposalFreezeEventUuid, FREEZE_YN AS freezeYn, DEGREE AS degree, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, END_YN AS endYn, TERMINATOR_UUID AS terminatorUuid, END_DATE AS endDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE

SELECT DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID AS disposalFreezeDegreeUuid, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID AS disposalFreezeEventUuid, FREEZE_YN AS freezeYn, DEGREE AS degree, DESCRIPTION AS description, NOTES AS notes, END_YN AS endYn, TERMINATOR_UUID AS terminatorUuid, END_DATE AS endDate, INSERT_UUID AS insertUuid, INSERT_DATE AS insertDate, UPDATE_UUID AS updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE WHERE DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID = #{disposalFreezeDegreeUuid}
mapper.update: UPDATE DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE SET DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID = #{disposalFreezeEventUuid}, FREEZE_YN = #{freezeYn}, DEGREE = #{degree}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, NOTES = #{notes}, END_YN = #{endYn}, TERMINATOR_UUID = #{terminatorUuid}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, INSERT_UUID = #{insertUuid}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate}, UPDATE_UUID = #{updateUuid}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate} WHERE DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID = #{disposalFreezeDegreeUuid}

INSERT INTO DF_DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE ( DISPOSAL_FREEZE_DEGREE_UUID, DISPOSAL_FREEZE_EVENT_UUID, FREEZE_YN, DEGREE, DESCRIPTION, NOTES, END_YN, TERMINATOR_UUID, END_DATE, INSERT_UUID, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_UUID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{disposalFreezeDegreeUuid}, #{disposalFreezeEventUuid}, #{freezeYn}, #{degree}, #{description}, #{notes}, #{endYn}, #{terminatorUuid}, #{endDate}, #{insertUuid}, #{insertDate}, #{updateUuid}, #{updateDate} )
